snippet.title: Populous 2 - Amiga version random play
snippet.description:
First level out of 999 available.  Very minimal sound effects.

Footage cut to fit Armageddon in (no transition to show jump in footage) that occurs at 7:01.

Later levels become more fun once all powers are available, e.g. Baptismal fonts. 

Hall Of Light entry
http://hol.abime.net/1108
